official-title.#text: To amend title 10, United States Code, to ensure that members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces who have served on active duty or performed active service since September 11, 2001, in support of a contingency operation or in other emergency situations receive credit for such service in determining eligibility for early receipt of non-regular service retired pay, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: National Guardsmen and Reservists Parity for Patriots Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the
Since September 11, 2001, members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces have been sent into harm's way and fought alongside members of the regular components of the Armed Forces.

Between September 11, 2001, and January 28, 2008, more than 600,000 members of the reserve components have been mobilized in support of military operations in Iraq and Afghanistan and for other contingency operations.
More than 142,000 members of the reserve components have been mobilized more than once during this same period.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , to offer an earlier retirement benefit for members of the reserve components who are mobilized in support of contingency operations.

text.#text: In recognition of the service performed by these members of the reserve components, Congress enacted

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 647 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008/s:647

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: only considers service performed after the date of the enactment of such Act, January 28, 2008, and this effective date fails to recognize the service and sacrifice made by members of the reserve components between September 11, 2001, and January 28, 2008.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 647 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008/s:647

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 647 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008/s:647

header.#text: Consideration of service since September 11, 2001, in determining early eligibility for receipt of non-regular service retired pay

quote.#text: in any fiscal year after such date
such duty or service after that date during fiscal year 2002 and any subsequent fiscal year
